archimate:Product.name: DSE Graph Datastax
archimate:Product.documentation:
DataStax Enterprise Graph™, part of DataStax Enterprise's multi-model platform, is a real-time graph database built for cloud applications that need to manage complex and highly connected data. Built on the foundation of Apache Cassandra and Apache TinkerPop, DataStax Enterprise Graph delivers continuous uptime along with predictable performance and scale, while remaining operationally simple to manage. https://www.datastax.com/products/datastax-graph A distributed graph database optimized for enterprise applications - zero downtime, fast traversals at scale, and real-time analysis of complex, related datasets. Optimized for storing billions of items and their relationships, DSE Graph incorporates all the enterprise-class capabilities of DataStax Enterprise, including continuous availability, linear scalability, advanced security, analytics and full-text search, visual management, visual monitoring and a tools suite for developers. True multi-model platform—real-time Gremlin query language or CQL and offline Apache Spark allow you to create graph applications easily
In short, DSE Graph enables you to identify and analyze hidden relation
